name: Holodiag
tag_list: polymorph-screening, salt-screening, crystallization, solid-state-characterization, pharmaceutical-consulting, enantiomer-separation
overview:
Holodiag is a CRO with services dedicated to the pharmaceutical solid state. Our services include :

  • Solid state analyses (X-ray diffraction, DSC, TGA, ..)

  • Crystallization screening (including polymorph screening, salt screening and selection, co-crystal screening, counter-ions, solvents, single crystals, resolving agents)

  • Process development (selective crystallization of polymorphs, enantiomer separation, purity/yield optimization)

  • Pharmaceutical consulting

We have a laboratory dedicated to the handling of cytotoxic, CMR and highly potent materials.

Our customers like our custom-built services, the elaborated report as well as the scientific and technical support, the swift processing of the analyses (5 worked days) and the expertise of our team.

Analytical Services: X-ray powder diffraction T.G.A. D.S.C. Crystallinity pKa Solubilities Quantification Polymorphic purity Quality control Formulation control Polarimetry Counterfeit analysis More techniques

Screening: Salt selection Polymorphism/Solvates Co-crystallization Resolving agents Single crystals

Highly Potent: Analytical services Contract research

R&D Services: Pharmaceutical development Crystallization Polymorphism Solvates / Hydrates Chiral molecules Scale-up

Consulting: Project development Litigation/Expert witness Patent search/ Bibliography
